scripts.checkyarn: echo "$npm_execpath" | grep -q "yarn\.js$" || (echo '⚠️  Use yarn not npm! ⚠️ ' && echo && exit 1)
scripts.setup: yarn global add skpm; cd purescript; yarn install && bower i; cd ../sketch-plugin; yarn install;
scripts.build: cd purescript; yarn run build; cd ../sketch-plugin; yarn run build
scripts.watch: concurrently "cd purescript; yarn run watch;" "cd sketch-plugin; yarn start;"
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./*.sketchplugin ./node_modules; cd ./purescript; yarn run clean; cd ../sketch-plugin; rm -rf ./node_modules;
